text: mnusʹychati thanghlay cng yakerng phracea khxng phwk cea thi di bangkeid phwk cea ma cak chiwit hnung læa di thrng bangkeid cak chiwit nan sung khukhrxng khxng khea læa di thrng hı phær saphad pi cak thang sxng nan sung brrda chay læa brrda hying xan makmay læa cng ya ke rng xallxhˌ thi phwk cea tang khx kan dwy phraxngkh læa phung raksʹa kherux yati thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng sxdsxng du phwk cea xyu semx
